titles.title: Honoring the life and accomplishments of Arva "Marie" Johnson, a pioneer in the United States Capitol Police Department when she became the first African-American female to wear the uniform of the United States Capitol Police Department.

Honoring the life and accomplishments of Arva "Marie" Johnson, a pioneer in the United States Capitol Police Department when she became the first African-American female to wear the uniform of the United States Capitol Police Department.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Commends Arva "Marie" Johnson, the first African-American female to wear the uniform of the U.S. Capitol Police Department, for her distinguished career of service to the Department and the people of the United States.
